suggestions.original: To improve the realism of the artwork, focus on refining the proportions and adding more detailed textures to the figures and elements. Study real-life references to better understand human anatomy and natural forms. Enhance the depth by incorporating shading and highlights to create a more three-dimensional effect. Pay attention to consistent lighting and perspective to make the scene more convincing. Additionally, consider using a more subdued color palette to mimic real-life colors and improve the overall believability of the composition.
